    @allure.title("Create Protocol and select based on policy for Endotoxin residue verification")
    @allure.description("This test case tests API to Create Protocol based on policy for endotoxin residue "
                        "verification when volume is L")
    @allure.link("https://app.clickup.com/t/86cu9qtt1")
    @pytest.mark.formulation
    @pytest.mark.create_protocol_endotoxin_residue_verification_based_on_policy_l
    def test_create_protocol_endotoxin_residue_verification_based_on_policy_l(self):
        endotoxin_data = {}
    
        endotoxin_data.update(self.DEFAULT_VOLUME_L)
        unit = self.update_default_unit.test_get_default_unit(endotoxin_data)["response"]
        unit = json.loads(unit)["default_units"]["unit"]
    
        if unit != "L":
            self.update_default_unit.test_update_default_unit(endotoxin_data)
            self.change_assessment.test_start_cleaning_assessment(scenario=True)
            self.change_assessment.test_submit_approve_cleaning_assessment()
    
        policy = self.policy_microbial.test_get_microbial_cleaning_limits_policy()["response"]
        self.protocol_endotoxin.DIRECT_ENDOTOXIN_VALUES = json.loads(policy)
        self.protocol_endotoxin.INDIRECT_ENDOTOXIN_VALUES = json.loads(policy)
    
        columns_prod = ["production_id"]
        productions_list = Excel.read_excel_columns(const.get_master_data(), "config", columns_prod)
        data = {"production": productions_list["production_id"], "description": "Automation Protocol"}
        protocol_detail, data = self.setup_protocol(data)
        self.multi_protocol.PROTOCOL = json.loads(protocol_detail)
        data.update({"protocol_name": None})
        protocol_id = self.multi_protocol.get_protocol_id(data)
        data.update({"protocol_id": protocol_id, "endotoxin_verification": True})
        data.update({"update_verification_protocol": protocol_verification_payload(data)})
        get_equipment = self.protocol_equipment.get_equipment_protocol(data)["response"]
        self.protocol_endotoxin.PROTOCOL_ENDOTOXIN_EQUIPMENT = json.loads(get_equipment)
        self.protocol_verification.update_inspection_protocol(data)
    
        direct_equipments_sal = self.protocol_endotoxin.get_endotoxin_direct_details_based_on_policy(data)[
            "response"]
        self.protocol_endotoxin.DIRECT_ENDOTOXIN_EQUIPMENT = json.loads(direct_equipments_sal)
    
        indirect_equipments_sal = self.protocol_endotoxin.get_endotoxin_indirect_details_based_on_policy(data)[
            "response"]
    
        self.protocol_endotoxin.INDIRECT_ENDOTOXIN_EQUIPMENT = json.loads(indirect_equipments_sal)
    
        direct_equipment = self.protocol_endotoxin.direct_endotoxin_update_policy_payload()["equipments"]
    
        indirect_equipment = self.protocol_endotoxin.indirect_endotoxin_update_policy_payload()["equipments"]
    
        data.update({"direct_equipment": direct_equipment, "indirect_equipment": indirect_equipment,
                     "direct_policy": "policyBased", "indirect_policy": "policyBased"})
        data.update({"update_endotoxin_residue_verification_payload": endotoxin_residue_verification_payload(data)})
    
        self.protocol_endotoxin.update_endotoxin_residue_verification_protocol(data)
